original: /rdo rje theg pa'i rtsha ba'i ltung ba zhes🔽bya ba bzhugs so//
analyzed: /rdo rje theg pa'i rtsha ba'i ltung ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
translated: In Sanskrit: Vajrayānamūlāpatti

original: nye@ga   // @##/_/rgya gar skad du/_badzra ya na mu la pa ti/_bod skad du/_rdo
analyzed: nye@ga   // @##/_/rgya gar skad du/_badzra ya na mu la pa ti/_bod skad du/_rdo
translated: In Tibetan: rDo rje theg pa’i rtsa ba’i ltung ba

original: rje theg pa'i rtsha ba'i ltung ba/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshhal lo//
analyzed: rje theg pa'i rtsha ba'i ltung ba/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshhal lo//
translated: Homage to youthful Mañjuśrī.

original: kun nas dang bas bla ma yi/_/zhabs kyi pad+ma la btud de/_/rtsha ba'i ltung ba
analyzed: kun nas dang bas bla ma yi/_/zhabs kyi pad+ma la btud de/_/rtsha ba'i ltung ba
translated: With complete faith, I bow to the lotus feet of the guru🔽and will explain the fourteen root downfalls

original: bcu bzhi ni/_/rgyud las gsungs pa bshad par bya/_/gang phyir rdo rje 'dzin
analyzed: bcu bzhi ni/_/rgyud las gsungs pa bshad par bya/_/gang phyir rdo rje 'dzin
translated: taught in the tantras, because the Vajra Holder🔽has said that attainments follow the master.

original: pa yis/_/dngos grub slob dpon rjes 'brangs gsungs/_/de bas de la
analyzed: pa yis/_/dngos grub slob dpon rjes 'brangs gsungs/_/de bas de la
translated: Therefore, to despise him🔽is said to be the first root downfall.

original: brnyas pa ni/_/rtsha ba'i ltung ba dang por bshad/_/bde gshegs bka' las
analyzed: brnyas pa ni/_/rtsha ba'i ltung ba dang por bshad/_/bde gshegs bka' las
translated: To transgress the words of the Sugata🔽is said to be the second downfall.

original: 'das pa ni/_/ltung ba gnyis pa yin par bshad/_/rdo rje spun la khros pas ni/
analyzed: 'das pa ni/_/ltung ba gnyis pa yin par bshad/_/rdo rje spun la khros pas ni/
translated: To be angry at vajra siblings🔽is the third fault.

original: nyes pa brjod pa gsum pa yin/_/sems can rnams la byams pa spong /_/
analyzed: nyes pa brjod pa gsum pa yin/_/sems can rnams la byams pa spong /_/
translated: To abandon love for sentient beings🔽is the fourth fault.

original: bzhi pa yin par rgyal bar gsungs/_/chos kyi rtsha ba byang chub sems/_/de
analyzed: bzhi pa yin par rgyal bar gsungs/_/chos kyi rtsha ba byang chub sems/_/de
translated: The fourth is said to be a defeat by the Victorious One.🔽The fifth is to abandon the Dharma,🔽which is the bodhichitta.🔽The sixth is to disparage the Dharma

original: spong ba ni lnga pa yin/_/rang ngam gzhan gyi grub pa'i mtha'/_/chos la smod pa
analyzed: spong ba ni lnga pa yin/_/rang ngam gzhan gyi grub pa'i mtha'/_/chos la smod pa
translated: of either oneself or others.🔽The seventh is to proclaim the secret

original: drug pa yin/_/yongs su ma smin sems can la/_/gsang ba sgrog pa bdun pa🔽rdo theg pa'i rtsha ba'i ltung ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
analyzed: drug pa yin/_/yongs su ma smin sems can la/_/gsang ba sgrog pa bdun pa rdo theg pa'i rtsha ba'i ltung ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
translated: to sentient beings who are not ready.🔽The eighth is to disparage the aggregates,

original: yin/_/phung po sangs rgyas lnga bdag nyid/_/de la smod byed brgyad pa yin/_/
analyzed: yin/_/phung po sangs rgyas lnga bdag nyid/_/de la smod byed brgyad pa yin/_/
translated: which are the nature of the five buddhas.🔽The ninth is to doubt

original: rang bzhin dag pa'i chos rnams la/_/som nyi za ba dgu pa yin/_/gdugs
analyzed: rang bzhin dag pa'i chos rnams la/_/som nyi za ba dgu pa yin/_/gdugs
translated: the naturally pure dharmas.🔽The tenth is to be loving

original: la brtag tu byams ldan par/_/byed pa de ni bcu par 'dod/_/ming sogs
analyzed: la brtag tu byams ldan par/_/byed pa de ni bcu par 'dod/_/ming sogs
translated: toward those who are to be investigated.🔽The eleventh is to think

original: bral ba'i chos rnams la/_/der rtog pa ni bcu gcig pa/_/sems can dad
analyzed: bral ba'i chos rnams la/_/der rtog pa ni bcu gcig pa/_/sems can dad
translated: that phenomena are free from names and so forth.

original: dang ldan pa yi/_/sems sun 'byin pa bcu gnyis pa/_/dam tshhig las ni ji
analyzed: dang ldan pa yi/_/sems sun 'byin pa bcu gnyis pa/_/dam tshhig las ni ji
translated: The twelfth is to discourage🔽the faith of sentient beings.🔽The thirteenth is to transgress🔽the samaya.

original: bzhin rnyed/_/mi brten pa de bcu gsum pa/_/shes rab rang bzhin bud med
analyzed: bzhin rnyed/_/mi brten pa de bcu gsum pa/_/shes rab rang bzhin bud med
translated: sister, or daughter, or who is of the nature of wisdom.🔽The fourteenth is not to disparage women.

original: la/_/smod par byed pa bcu bzhi pa/_/sngags pas 'di dag spangs na ni/_/
analyzed: la/_/smod par byed pa bcu bzhi pa/_/sngags pas 'di dag spangs na ni/_/
translated: If the mantrin abandons these,🔽he will definitely attain power.

original: dngos grub nges par 'thob par 'gyur/_/gzhan du dam tshhig las nyams na/_/
analyzed: dngos grub nges par 'thob par 'gyur/_/gzhan du dam tshhig las nyams na/_/
translated: Otherwise, if he transgresses the commitments,🔽he will be seized by Mara, the corrupter, and

original: nyams pas bdud kyis bzung bar 'gyur/_/de nas sdug bsngal myong 'gyur zhing /_/
analyzed: nyams pas bdud kyis bzung bar 'gyur/_/de nas sdug bsngal myong 'gyur zhing /_/
translated: will experience suffering,🔽and, looking down, he will go to hell.

original: thur du bltas te dmyal bar 'gro/_/de bas nga rgyal bcom nas ni/_/bdag🔽nyid ma 'khrul shes par bya/_/mnyam par bzhag pas bla ma la/_/ci 'byor pa
analyzed: thur du bltas te dmyal bar 'gro/_/de bas nga rgyal bcom nas ni/_/bdag nyid ma 'khrul shes par bya/_/mnyam par bzhag pas bla ma la/_/ci 'byor pa
translated: Therefore, having conquered pride,🔽one should know oneself to be undeluded.🔽With equipoise, one should make offerings to the guru🔽with whatever one has.

original: yis mchod par bya/_/gsum la skyabs 'gro nas brtshams te/_/byang chub🔽sems sogs sdom pa ni/_/gal te bdag la phan 'dod na/_/sngags pas
analyzed: yis mchod par bya/_/gsum la skyabs 'gro nas brtshams te/_/byang chub sems sogs sdom pa ni/_/gal te bdag la phan 'dod na/_/sngags pas
translated: Beginning with going for refuge to the Three,🔽the commitments such as the thought of awakening🔽should be taken by the mantrin if he wishes to benefit himself.

original: 'bad de bzung bar bya/_/rdo rje theg pa'i rtsha ba'i ltung ba rdzogs so/_//
analyzed: 'bad de bzung bar bya/_/rdo rje theg pa'i rtsha ba'i ltung ba rdzogs so/_//
translated: The downfalls of the Vajrayana are complete.
